class.name: FallBoundary
class.brief_description: A world boundary which when crossed will call [method Player.die]
class.description: A specialized [Area2D] that uses a [WorldBoundaryShape2D] to indicate the bottom bound of the player-accessible world.

members.member: The read-only Y value of the bottom of the boundary. [b]Note:[/b] This is used by [PlatformSection] when determining if the section is no longer accessible to a player and should despawn.

The debug rectangle color used to display the bounds of the [FallBoundary] in the editor. [b]Note:[/b] The debug rectangle is [b]only[/b] created and added to the [SceneTree] if [method Engine.is_editor_hint] returns [code]true[/code].
